name: Moorhuhn präsentiert Die Funbox
summary:
This is a compilation of games by phenomedia. Most of them are short versions or demos, marked by the suffix XS in their title.

Moorhuhn 2: Die Jagd geht weiter
Moorhuhn Tennis
Bull Run (a Pac-Man style game)
Höllenjob XS
Moorhuhn: Wanted XS
Moorfrosch XS
Moorhuhn: Kart 2 XS
Moorhuhn X: Schnecken Trainer
Gütertrennung XS
